_sText:
BACKGROUND: On a sunny afternoon of November 2005 a group of terrorists capture hostages in the metro, meantime the police evacuates the territory. The rescuing movement begins when special forces infiltrating the separated area by two designated points.

DESIGN PRINCIPLES: Back in his universty yrs r.man decided to try to make a realistic adaptation of metro stations for Counter-Strike. The initial versions were made in 1.6 but soon the project got new grounds with CS:S with ambitious features like moving trains and escalators. These design ideas lead to the need that this map should represent studio quality visuals achieved by many hundreds of photos taken at the real locations.

STEAM WORKSHOP
